visible resolved dear please be advised issue regarding annual leave days being visible resolved should you wish submit any annual leave special leave requests you can follow normal procedure we collaboration understanding ext hub sent tuesday notification annual leave days visible dear please be advised we still investigating absences issue with high priority meanwhile please note won allow you submit any annual leave special leave requests should you need book any days off within working week please liaise with responsible teams manually update your absence records into germany colombia seen needs be updated accordingly our engineers investigating issue with high priority we get back you with updates when available please note applies locations should you have any questions please hesitate contact thank you kind regards ext hub

message.reasoning:
**Categorizing Ticket Content**

I'm currently processing an IT ticket. My focus is on determining the correct classification from the given options, considering the mention of "annual leave days" and "abs". This appears to lean towards "HR Support".

**Refining Ticket Classification**

My ongoing analysis of the IT ticket solidifies the classification as "HR Support." The explicit references to "annual leave days," "absence issues," and the need to "submit any annual leave special leave requests" strongly confirm this categorization.
